name: Grow Seeds
description:
Meet the pips - your new best buds! They’ll grow from hatchlings to seeds to growing you full-blown trees, all with your expert help. Dress them up, grow plants together and start your very own adventure.

Welcome to Piptopia!

Grow Seeds starts by giving you an empty forest and your first egg, so you’re ready to start building a beautiful world of plants! After planting your egg, you’ll get to meet your first pip. Your pip will guide you through growing your kingdom and creating a gorgeous landscape! Every pip has a different power - some can remove obstacles in your way, and others offer unique bonuses to improve your world. Each pip also grows a unique tree that gives your world a special boost, so make sure you keep your Pips as happy as possible, and they'll keep your world just as happy as they grow plants!

There are tons of unique looks to choose for your pips, and they’ll make sure to let you know their favorites! Be careful, although Pips love getting dressed up, they can be very picky. They'll also let you know what they like to eat because a hungry pip isn't a growing pip. They love sugary treats, and they need to eat a lot of them to grow! So, make sure you listen to your pips likes and dislikes so they can look great, feel great, and want to help you build the perfect home. To buy them everything they need you’ll need candy currency or crystals, which you earn from planting trees and maintaining a happy world - save up and you can upgrade your pips stats for even more exciting bonuses!

Features

- 23 Pips each with a unique tree!
- Over 20 exciting locations to visit and explore
- Dress your pips in over 50 awesome accessories!
- Feed your pips with over 40 food types!
- Share your world with your friends!
- Daily rewards and achievements to unlock!
- Discover mysterious crafted artifacts and skins!

Plant it - Grow it - Love IT!

To speed up your world’s growth, you’ll need to beat your drum! Pips love music, and the more you tap your drum, the faster they’ll work and grow plants. Keep playing the drum and watch your pips work twice as hard to the beat! Once your pips fully develop, they can start to tackle obstacles and begin expansion. As you start expanding, you'll discover that the world of Piptopia is vast and filled with adventure - you'll traverse sunny jungles, misty wastelands, and even cactus fields in the plant game that knows no bounds.

Start your adventure today!

The adventure of a lifetime might only be a pip away! Get tapping, get planting, and discover the phenomenal world of Grow Seeds. Growing an adventure has never been so relaxing and fun. Kick back and breathe in the beauty of a magical forest in the plant game that’s packed with CUTENESS!

It’s time to get your grow on and meet the pips - Welcome to Grow Seeds!
